content: For the fourth quarter, we expect ACV plus trailing 12-month royalties of $47.5 million to $51.5 million and revenue of $10.8 million to $11.8 million with non-GAAP operating loss margin of 50.2% to 70.2% and non-GAAP free cash flow margin of negative 13.1% to negative 47.1%. For the full year, we expect revenue of $50 million to $51 million, ACV plus trailing 12-month royalties to exit 2022 at $47.5 million to $51.5 million, non-GAAP operating loss margin of 31.6% to 36.1% and non-GAAP free cash flow margin of negative 16.6% to negative 24.6%.
